episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses: Indoctrination through Propaganda
episodes.description:
Watchtower media is used to evoke an emotional response from Jehovah's Witnesses. 

The original videos:
JW Bunker Video: https://youtu.be/wNtlDybBVA8
Obey Jehovah (magical toy): https://youtu.be/gRoETHf6kpU
Remember the Wife of Lot: https://youtu.be/19mCV-ihsUE
November 2017 JW Broadcasting: https://youtu.be/003qQGhQmNI
September 2017 JW Broadcasting:https://youtu.be/Qui4bCrSvBM
Sergie's Story: https://youtu.be/gCk2XbJukIs
What is True Love: https://youtu.be/hA550-nhJps

episodes.title: Exclusive Truth Claims: Jehovah's Witnesses & Latter-day Saints
episodes.description:
Jehovah's Witnesses & The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints both claim to be God's one true organization.

Please also watch:
Spiritual Witnesses: https://youtu.be/UJMSU8Qj6Go
My LDS Journey (Follow the Spirit): https://youtu.be/ycUvC9s4VYA
"Fix your faith crisis with this one weird trick!": http://thoughtsonthingsandstuff.com/fix-your-faith-crisis-with-this-one-weird-trick/
2013 JW Convention (Human Apostates): https://youtu.be/TuLjP4Ka4i0
John Cedars' "Worst Convention Ever" Series: https://youtu.be/WK7GPoGkWw4
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Speaking for God: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description:
Like other exclusive truth claim religions, Jehovah's Witnesses claim to be God's one true religion. The Governing Body is the religion's "faithful and discreet slave", "prophet", and "channel for new light".

Other religions warn about Internet, Satan, & apostates:
https://youtu.be/PskXA-32UR4
